title: Building a Machine Learning App Interface
headline: This free online course shows you how to build a handwriting recognition app and covers the basics of Core ML.
description: This is a free online course that introduces you to the fundamental concepts of machine learning, and how to start building apps that can ‘think’. It explains how convolutional neural networks work and how to classify images. Learn how to build the app interface using the interface builder. This course explains how to make a simple iOS app in Xcode as well as how to create a new Swift project. Register and start today!

courseDescription:
Machine learning is basically a way that our programs and applications can learn from different data that has been passed into our application to make predictions, based on the information that was received. A great way to use deep learning to classify images is to build a convolutional neural network (CNN). The Keras library in Python makes it simple to build a CNN. This is a free online course that introduces you to Keras and you will learn the difference between TensorFlow and Keras. A dataset in machine learning is simply a collection of data pieces that can be treated by a computer as a single unit for analytic and prediction purposes. This means that the data collected should be made uniform and understandable for a machine that doesn't see data the same way as humans do. This course explains how a CNN works and how to classify images.

Next, you will learn how to run values through convolutional layers, and all the cool processing you need to do. The material describes how to build your CNN using Keras. The goal of machine learning is to mimic the human mind. It can be used to identify things like objects or images, make predictions and even analyze and identify speech. This course teaches you how to build an app that can recognize handwriting using Core ML. It explains the process of importing Core ML to a project in order to use it. This course teaches you how to perform OCR (optical character recognition) handwriting recognition using OpenCV, Keras, and TensorFlow. You will understand the process involved in making a prediction using Core ML to create a request handler. This course teaches you how to handle the result given from Core ML and use the result to cycle through. You will discover what is required in order to determine what number you are actually predicting.

Finally, you are going to learn everything you need to know to start building more intelligent apps and your own machine learning models. Core ML is the foundation for domain-specific frameworks and functionality. It supports Vision for analyzing images, and Natural Language for processing text. Core ML also supports Speech for converting audio to text, and Sound Analysis for identifying sounds in audio. This course will introduce you to Core Machine Learning, how it works, and how to use it properly. It gives you hands-on knowledge on how to correctly integrate machine learning into iOS apps. You will be guided on how to make a custom UI (user interface) collection view flow layout. This course will be of benefit to website and application developers, and digital or data analysts with basic knowledge of the Python environment.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module introduces you to the uses of Keras. You will learn the difference between tensor flow and Keras. It explains how Convolutional Neural Network works and how to classify images. This module teaches you how to run values through convolutional layers. You will also learn to build your Convolutional Neural Network using Keras.
topics: Building A Conventional Neural Network - Learning Outcomes
Use Of Keras And CNN Dataset
Building A Conventional Neural Network - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn how to build an app that can recognize handwriting using the Core ML module. This module teaches you how to draw on your screen in ML. You will learn how to import the core ML model to a project in order to use it. You will learn how to handle the result given from Core ML and use the result to cycle through.
topics: Building A Hand Writing Recognition App - Learning Outcomes
Building Hand Writing Recognition App - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about Machine learning, how it works. It explains the process of integrating Machine Learning into iOS Apps. You will learn how to build the app interface using the interface builder. This module teaches you how to make a custom UI collection view flow layout.
topics: Core Machine Learning Basics - Learning Outcomes
Core Machine Learning Basics - Lesson Summary
